comments:
I have a number of languages installed in XP, including hebrew. Sometimes when I
type with Swedish IM the letter ordering becomes RTL. This only happens in one
editor (if I switch to another editor, it is normal, when I switch back, it
still is funny), and is unrelated to the current IM of the operating system.

Completion and other actions that insert text into the editor come out LTR, as
expected.

Currently this happens in an HTML-editor from myeclipse.

The following exception is thrown on each key stroke:

Error 2005-05-07 11:53:25.698 java.lang.NullPointerException
